name: Shrimp Scampi Lisa-Style
author: knlneal
summary: The shrimp scampi that even those that aren't shrimp lovers will become one! With a slight bold spicy flavor, it will soon be a family-favorite as it is ours. Serve over linguini. I usually add butter and garlic salt tossed in the linguini.
ingredients: 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
salt and ground white and red pepper to taste
⅓ cup hot sauce (such as Louisiana®)
½ cup grated Parmesan-Romano cheese, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Arrange shrimp in a single layer in a 9x13-inch baking dish
Evenly pour olive oil over shrimp and top with bread crumbs, parsley, garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Bake in the preheated oven until shrimp are cooked through, about 20 minutes
Combine butter, white wine, and hot sauce in a small bowl; pour over shrimp
Bake in the oven until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes more
